ygData.messageBody:
I also agree. As of now, and maybe from now on, I will not ever use my pet
again. Bringing the pet through Lower Guk would be something that no one is
stupid enough to do. And since grouping is basically mandatory after level
20 (or level 30 depending on what you fight), pets, in my opinion, is almost
useless at that point. Sure, there is an occasional spectre that Bony might
help, but it does more harm than good. If the change was made, I would be
using the new Lifetap spells more than I would use the Summon Pet series.

I always thought it will be cool to be a fighter with a pet. But seeing the
SK downtime and the uselessness of the pet (doesn't attack in PvP and duels,
train-makers), I quickly realized that the pet is nothing more than a
novelty and needs to be replaced. Unless they change the mobs aggressiveness
towards the pet being dependent upon the SK's level, I see no reason to
summon a pet in a dungeon.




>From: <coregimp@...>
>
>Shadowknights don't have
>the diversity their exp penalty should grant. Lifespike (10 dmg) should be
>a lvl 9 spell, vampiric embrace moves to 15 and then the level 12 necro
>lifetap is at 22....sound fair? I like it. As of the moment just getting
>the lifetap series would be too powerful...and I'd trade ol Gebeker in any
>day for a way to heal myself.
